EVENT.FIRMATA_WRONG_DEVICE_TYPE: Got UDP event with deviceID <{{ID}}> but attached device <{{NAME}}> has not type FirmataNetworkEntity
EVENT.FOUND_FIRMATA_DEVICE: Found device '{{BOARD}}' with device id '{{ID}}' and ip address '{{IP}}'
EVENT.CHANGED_IP: Detected change IP for firmata device: <DEVICE> from <OLD> to <NEW>

FIRMATA.NEW_DEVICE_QUESTION: Do you want create new firmata network device?
